failures.could-not-update-profile: Failed to update Profile on Permobil server.
failures.must-wear-watch: [Check for Wrist] Setting is enabled, therefore the smartwatch must be worn to control your SmartDrive.
failures.no-auth-for-saving: To save settings to the server, which is optional, you must connect PushTracker Wear OS app to the PushTracker Mobile app. To do this follow the instructions on the "Device Setup" page of the PushTracker Mobile app.
failures.not-connected-to-mobile: Failed to authenticate with Permobil server. Reconnection to PushTracker Mobile app required.
failures.not-fully-initialized: Still initializing connection to Permobil server. Settings will be sent when possible.
failures.permissions: Unable to perform the requested action. Required permissions were not granted.
failures.title: Notice

notifications.add-pt-element: Want quicker access to your PushTracker stats? You can change the watch face to set a shortcut. Check out our YouTube channel or email us for details.
notifications.daily-push-warning: Friendly reminder! You have pushed 25% more today than your daily average. Consider taking a break or using your SmartDrive more.
notifications.foreground-service: Permobil PushTracker is collecting your activity
notifications.new-coast-record: You did it! You achieved a new personal best for coast time. Doing more, while saving your shoulders! #ChooseToDoMore
notifications.wheelchair-maintenance: Keeping your wheelchair maintained makes pushing easier. Caster wheels, caster forks, and tire wear are common issues that influence your ability to push your chair.

permissions-reasons.coarse-location: To connect with the PushTracker Mobile app on your iPhone using Bluetooth we require you to allow the Location permission [ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION] on the following screen. From this permission Permobil will not be accessing your location data.
permissions-reasons.fine-location: OPTIONAL: To measure distance using your smartwatch GPS we need you to allow the  permission [ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION] on one of the following screens. From this permission Permobil will not be accessing your location data.
permissions-reasons.phone-state: OPTIONAL: To access your smartwatch Serial Number, which can be useful for support and warranty purposes, we need you to allow the Phone permission [READ_PHONE_STATE] on one of the following screens. From this permission Permobil will not be accessing your phone number, cellular network information, or any other data except the smartwatch serial number.

coastgoal.description: Your goal for average coast time between pushes each day.
coastgoal.title: Coast Time Goal

distancegoal.description: Your goal for distance traveled in your wheelchair each day as measured by a SmartDrive.
distancegoal.title: Distance Traveled Goal

settings.install-smartdrive: Install SmartDrive MX2+ Wear OS App

language.change: Are you sure you wish to change the language? The PushTracker app must restart to apply the language change.
language.description: The language of the text in the PushTracker app.
language.title: Language

pushsensitivity.description: The sensitivity of the detection used to count pushes. The lower the percentage is the less sensitive it is to detecting a push - 0% is the least sensitive and therefore will detect fewer pushes, and 100% is the most sensitive and therefore will detect more pushes.
pushsensitivity.title: Push Sensitivity

settings.title: PushTracker Settings

units.description: The unit system or units of measure to display the measurements within the user interfaces. Select either Imperial [ft, mi and lbs] or Metric [cm, km and kg].
units.title: Units

errors.bad-authorization: Invalid account authorization data received from PushTracker Mobile app. Ensure your account information is up-to-date and your smartwatch is connected to the internet either through Wi-Fi or your phone.
errors.bad-data: Invalid data received from PushTracker Mobile app. Check the connection and try again.
